targets.query: select last(power_system_capacity) from POWER_EXT  where device=~/$device/ and component_name=~/(?i)chassis.*/  AND $timeFilter  group by device, VERSION, MODEL, component_name fill(0)
SELECT last("temperature_ambient") FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE device=~/$device/ and component_name=~/(?i)chassis.*/ GROUP BY device

select last(power_allocated) as "System Allocated" from (select mean(power_zone_0_allocated) + mean(power_zone_1_allocated) +mean(power_system_allocated) as power_allocated from POWER_EXT where device=~/$device/ and 
 component_name=~/(?i)chassis.*/  AND time > now()-5m  group by time(5m), device, component_name fill(0))

select last(power_system_capacity) as "System Capacity",  last(power_system_maximum) as "System Max.", last(power_system_remaining) as "System Remaining" from POWER_EXT  where device=~/$device/ and 
 component_name=~/(?i)chassis.*/  AND time > now()-5m  group by device, component_name fill(0)

select last(power_usage) as "System Usage"  from (select mean(power_zone_0_usage) + mean(power_zone_1_usage) +mean(power_system_usage) as power_usage from POWER_EXT where device=~/$device/ and 
 component_name=~/(?i)chassis.*/  AND time > now()-5m group by time(5m), device, component_name fill(0))

select last(power_zone_0_allocated), last(power_zone_0_capacity),  last(power_zone_0_maximum), last(power_zone_0_remaining), last(power_zone_0_usage) from POWER_EXT  where device=~/$device/ and 
 component_name=~/(?i)chassis.*/  AND $timeFilter group by device, component_name fill(0)

select last(power_zone_1_allocated), last(power_zone_1_capacity),  last(power_zone_1_maximum), last(power_zone_1_remaining), last(power_zone_1_usage) from POWER_EXT  where device=~/$device/ and 
 component_name=~/(?i)chassis.*/  AND $timeFilter group by device, component_name fill(0)
SELECT mean("device_traffic_in")*8 FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE "device"=~ /^$device$/  and $timeFilter group by time(5m)
SELECT mean("device_pps_in") FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE "device"=~ /^$device$/  and $timeFilter group by time(5m)

select (mean(power_zone_0_usage) + mean(power_zone_1_usage) + mean(power_system_usage)) / ((mean(device_traffic_in)*8)/1000000000) from POWER_EXT where device=~/$device/  and $timeFilter-5m group by time(5m), device fill(0)
SELECT "power_system_usage" FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE "device"=~ /^$device$/  group by device, MODEL fill(null)
SELECT "power_zone_0_usage" FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE "device"=~ /^$device$/  group by device, MODEL fill(null)
SELECT "power_zone_1_usage" FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE "device"=~ /^$device$/  group by device, MODEL fill(null)
SELECT used_power FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^^FPC+\d$/ and used_power!= 0 and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT used_power FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)PSM|PDM|PEM.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT used_power FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)Fan.*/ and used_power!= 0 and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)

SELECT used_power FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)CB.*|SIB|SFB|.*RE.*|SCB|SF|Routin.*/ and used_power!= 0 and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT output_power FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)PSM|PDM|PEM.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT used_power FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^^FPC+\d$/ and used_power!= 0 and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT output_power FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)PSM|PDM|PEM.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT used_power FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)Fan.*/ and used_power!= 0 and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT used_power FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)CB|SIB|SFB|RE|SCB|SF|Routin.*/ and used_power!= 0 and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT used_power FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)PSM|PDM|PEM.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT temperature FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT last(used_power), last(power_maximum) FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^^FPC+\d$/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT used_power FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^^FPC+\d$/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT last(used_power) FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)Fan.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT used_power FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)Fan.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT last("fan_speed") FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY component_name fill(0)
SELECT ("fan_speed") FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY component_name fill(0)
SELECT last(used_power) FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)CB|SIB|SFB|RE|SCB|SF|Routin.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT used_power FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)CB|SIB|SFB|RE|SCB|SF|Routin.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT last(used_power) FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)PSM|PDM|PEM.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
SELECT last(output_power) FROM "POWER_EXT" WHERE ("device"=~ /^$device$/) AND component_name =~/^(?i)PSM|PDM|PEM.*/ and $timeFilter group by component_name, device fill(0)
